lines.text:
[about Pete and Ellen, slamming phone down]
They are now in his room fucking.

[to Ellen, who is about to write an hurtful article about the Hastings]
When you'll write this, make sure I'm the monster!

[talking about Senator Hastings]
How much do you know about Sam, financially?
He's never had that much, it's a salary.
Look, we hired you to do a job, Mr. St. John, and it wasn't to investigate me and my company and it sure wasn't to exchange information with your ex-wife.
No, you explain it to me. He's with you except on solar energy. It's like saying he's with Gloria Steinem except on women.
